Test Name: JAK2 Exon 12-15 Sequencing (Polycythemia Vera Reflex Analysis)
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood or bone marrow aspirate
Purpose: To detect mutations in JAK2 Exons 12-15 for the diagnosis of Polycythemia Vera.
Equipment: Thermal cycler, agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus, automated DNA sequencer
